channel.title: Why my npc's not dieing?! Somone help please!
channel.description:
Hey, I've put npc's into my server and when you attack them umm i say, a guard when i attack it i kil him with 22 hitp then, don't die and i can't get drop somone help me pl0x!
Mod Kay Hope you can help me and i can help you! xD
